hero.title: Design. Engage. Grow.
hero.subtitle: CTEX Technologies delivers creative and technical services; web design, social media management, video production, and digital automations to help your brand grow locally and globally.

footer.description: At CTEX, we bring ideas to life through technology. Whether you need a website, social content, video, or design; we create solutions that help you stand out and connect, locally in Kenya and globally.
